item.title: Create A Twitter Chat-Bot with PHP .. in 5 minutes
item.description: We want to set up a simple Twitter chatbot that just replies with whatever we say to it.

item.title: My View on IPv6 Deployment
item.description: My very personal and foolish view on the current state of IPv6 deployment

item.title: Chunked Uploads with Titanium
item.description: The Titanium.Network.HTTPClient Object fails for large file uploads under iOS since the whole request is build entirely in memory by the Titanium SDK. Chunked uploading to the rescue!

item.title: Let's Blog: Another static Blog on GitHub Pages
item.description: These pages are statically generated from markdown formatted plaintext files and pushed to a GitHub Pages repository. Right now it's just a proof of concept, but there might be some useful posts here eventually.
